Happy.encouragement: Rejoice in the blessings God has given you today.
Happy.prayer: Lord, thank You for the joy and blessings in my life. Help me to remain grateful.

verses.text: This is the day that the Lord has made; let us rejoice and be glad in it.
Rejoice in the Lord always. I will say it again: Rejoice!
Do not grieve, for the joy of the Lord is your strength.
You make known to me the path of life; in your presence there is fullness of joy.

Sad.encouragement: God sees your tears and walks with you in every sorrow.
Sad.prayer: Lord, please comfort my heart and lift my spirit.

verses.text: The Lord is close to the brokenhearted and saves those who are crushed in spirit.
Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.
So with you: Now is your time of grief, but I will see you again and you will rejoice.
For no one is cast off by the Lord forever. Though he brings grief, he will show compassion.

Anxious.encouragement: God is bigger than every worry you carry.
Anxious.prayer: Lord, I give You my worries and fears. Please fill me with Your peace.

verses.text: Do not be anxious about anything, but in every situation, by prayer and petition, present your requests to God.
Cast all your anxiety on him because he cares for you.
Therefore do not worry about tomorrow, for tomorrow will worry about itself.
So do not fear, for I am with you; do not be dismayed, for I am your God.

Angry.encouragement: God helps us respond with love even when we feel hurt.
Angry.prayer: Lord, calm my heart and help me respond with grace and forgiveness.

verses.text: In your anger do not sin: Do not let the sun go down while you are still angry.
A gentle answer turns away wrath, but a harsh word stirs up anger.
Everyone should be quick to listen, slow to speak and slow to become angry.
Better a patient person than a warrior, one with self-control than one who takes a city.

Calm.encouragement: Rest in the peace that only God can give.
Calm.prayer: Lord, thank You for Your peace that guards my heart and mind.

verses.text: Peace I leave with you; my peace I give you.
In peace I will lie down and sleep, for you alone, Lord, make me dwell in safety.
You will keep in perfect peace those whose minds are steadfast, because they trust in you.
Let the peace of Christ rule in your hearts.

Down.encouragement: Even in low moments, God is lifting you up.
Down.prayer: Lord, please renew my strength and give me hope.

verses.text: But those who hope in the Lord will renew their strength.
Why, my soul, are you downcast? Put your hope in God.
Therefore we do not lose heart. Though outwardly we are wasting away, inwardly we are being renewed.
May the God of hope fill you with all joy and peace as you trust in him.
